revised_title: Extraordinary Skeleton and Man Who Gave Suck to a Child
tldr: The author shares the story of an extraordinary skeleton of a man whose bones grew together, making him one entire bone, and a man who breastfed a child. The author also mentions a man who asked for charity and, out of gratitude, showed the author his breasts, which he used to breastfeed his child after his wife's death. These stories are considered medical curiosities.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Anatomy
